title: Shocker Internet Drive In - Week 51: "Hot Hercules" Double Feature

sources.title: Shocker Internet Drive In - Week 51: "Hot Hercules" Double Feature
sources.description: Whew! Welcome back to your favorite drive-in on a hot sweltering August night in the good old USA. And, in honor of hot sweaty men and nicely endowed ladies, we are happy to bring you two classics of a Herculean nature. First up, after some muscle bound coming attractions as well as an appropriate "Popeye" cartoon, the management is proud to present that classic mixture of myth and science fiction - "Hercules Against the Moon Men", starring Alan Steel as Dwayne Johnson's namesake. Then, after the usual intermission, we are happy to bring you "Hercules and the Captive Women" featuring some "healthy" survivors of Atlantis. Needless to say, beach towels and baby oil will be heavily regulated! Enjoy our hot summer treat and don't forget to stop by the snack-bar. NEW Facebook Address:  https://www.facebook.com/shockerdrivein.dx.am website: http://shockerdrivein.dx.am or http://shockerdrivein.freeoda.com
